means: 拆开( dismantle的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Public services of all kinds are being dismantled.
sentence.Network_cn: 林林总总的公共设施正被逐渐废除。

sentence.Network_en: The plant was dismantled of all its equipment and furniture.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家工厂的设备和家具全被拆除了.

sentence.Network_en: The Japanese empire was quickly dismantled.
sentence.Network_cn: 日本帝国很快被打垮了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the whole equipment can be assembled and dismantled in a matter of hours ., 整套设备可以在几小时内安装或拆卸完毕.

this machine has a simple structure and is easy to be installed and dismantled and cleaned , with the features of stable running , convenient moving , low noise and high grinding efficiency etc .本机结构简单，粉碎室拆装与清洗方便，具有运转平稳、移动方便、噪音低、粉碎效果好等优点。
All the houses alone this road will dismantled soon ., 这一路的房子很快就要被拆除了.
move this dismantled parts away lest they should get damaged., 把这些卸下来的部件移开以免损坏.

entry.def: If you dismantle a machine or structure, you carefully separate it into its different parts.

example.ex: He asked for immediate help from the United States to dismantle the warheads.
example.tran: 他请求美国立即提供援助，拆除这批弹头。

entry.def: To dismantle an organization or system means to cause it to stop functioning by gradually reducing its power or purpose.

example.ex: ...opposition to the president's policy of dismantling apartheid...
example.tran: 反对总统废除种族隔离的政策

example.ex: Public services of all kinds are being dismantled.
example.tran: 林林总总的公共设施正被逐渐废除。

auth_sentence.content: The fact that nobody dismantled politically what she achieved.

auth_sentence.content: Factions themselves are too strong to be dismantled.
auth_sentence.res_content: Factions themselves are too strong to be dismantled.

auth_sentence.content: We want to see the entire infrastructure of terror dismantled.
auth_sentence.res_content: We want to see the entire infrastructure of terror dismantled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We want to see the entire infrastructure of terror dismantled.
